title: Luxury brand new apartment for sale in Orwell Residencies, Deal Place, Col 03.
details:
Own a Great Address in Colombo.
Luxury brand new apartment for sale in Orwell Residencies, Deal Place, Col 03.
Developer - SMI Housing Development Ltd.(India)
Contractor - MAGA
-3 bed, 2 bath, maid's room & bath, living, dining with balconies concluding 1980sqft
-All europian fittings (Twyford & GROHE)
-Luxury flooring with wood, marbel and tiles
-Imported fitted pantry
-All solid wood doors & powder coated alluminium windows
-24hr security with Intercom & CCTV
-3 passenger lifts
-Fully equipped gymnasium & swimming pool

Urgent Sale!
LKR 78,000,000/= (negotiable)
